location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Pringle Riach, Acting Resident, Bushire to the Accountant General, Fort William

mods.abstract: Covering letter for a register [not transcribed] of a set of bills of exchange drawn by Henry Willock, His Majesty's Charg√© d'Affaires at Tehran for subsidiary payment by the Bengal Government. The bill was in connection with His Majesty's mission to Persia. Riach explains that Catchatoor Johannes had negotiated the sale of the bills at Shiraz.
